#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long 
#define MOD 1000000007 
pair<ll int,ll int> st[100001];
vector<int> a[100001];
char val[100001];
ll int dfs(int i,int p)
{
	ll int sum=1;
	vector<ll int> temp;
	for(int j=0;j<a[i].size();j++)
	{
		if(a[i][j]==p)
			continue;
		ll int x=dfs(a[i][j],i);
		if(val[a[i][j]]!=val[i])
		{
			sum=(sum+x)%MOD;
			temp.push_back(x);
		}
	}
	ll int sum2 = 0;
	for(int j=0;j<temp.size();j++)
	{
		//cout<<temp[j]<<" "<<sum<<"\n";
		sum2 = (sum2 + (temp[j]*((sum-1-temp[j])%MOD+MOD)%MOD)%MOD)%MOD;
		
	}
	if(sum2%2!=0)
	{
		int x = 0;
		cout<<2/x<<"\n";
	}
	
	st[i] = make_pair(sum,sum2/2);
	return sum;
}
int main() {
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	for(int i=0;i<n-1;i++)
	{
		int u,v;
		cin>>u>>v;
		u--;
		v--;
		a[u].push_back(v);
		a[v].push_back(u);
	}
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>val[i];
	}
	dfs(0,-1);
	ll sum=0;
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		sum=(sum+(st[i].first+st[i].second)%MOD)%MOD;
	}
	cout<<sum;
	return 0;
}
